pages.title: Safe
pages.text: $(li)Safes can be used to save items in a safe way.$(br)$(li)They are immune to fire and they have two different modes.

pages.title: Simple Mode
pages.text: $(li)By default, Safes will be bound to the first person that places it / opens and unbound one.$(br)$(li)Other persons won't be able to open a safe and they will not be able to break it.

pages.title: Key Mode
pages.text: $(li)You can craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/key)Key$(/l) and change it's name in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l).$(br)$(li)Then, if you click on a Safe with this key, the safe will be bound to this key name and will only be able to be oppened when you have a key with the same name in the inventory.
